name: O BARRACO
description: SOCIALCRYPTOART - Paulinho, a 73-year-old man living on Morro Santo Amaro. He lost his humble home after an onset of fire. We're raising funds for reconstruction! And one of the ways to help is this NFT piece, where 100% of the amount raised will be allocated to the action organized by the Ademafia Institute (IG: @instituto_ademafia). || Piece developed for @socialcryptoart, which makes use of NFTS for social causes in real life. Huge thanks for the artists that collaborated: @kajaman @abuktt @marceloment @francamateus @wogelsketch @ottis.ts @remelattk @mtsabio_design @a_matesaru @tom.com.n @gasparianted @igorizy @joiacoll @viveaprende || Ways to help: 1. Collecting this NFT. 2. Donating directly for the wallet: socialcryptoart.tez (Temple) 3. Direct donation on crowdfunding. (http://vaka.me/1949348) (Credit Card, Cash)
